title: Introduction to Herbal Teas
description: Introduction to Herbal Teas Hosted By Synergy and Serenity. Event starts on Wednesday, 6 September 2023 and happening at 1803 Connecticut Ave NW fl 2, Washington, DC. Register or Buy Tickets, Price information.
cleaned_text: Wed Sep 06 2023 at 07:00 pm to 10:00 pm (GMT-04:00) 1803 Connecticut Ave NW fl 2, 1803 Connecticut Avenue Northwest, Washington, United States A great class for beginners interested in alternative herbal medicine. In this introductory class you will learn about a myriad of essential organic herbs sourced from our store. These herbs are beneficial, natural, supplements for weight loss, reproductive aid, muscle pain, digestive issues and many more. The herbs are also chakra related and should be used in meditation to help with correcting imbalanced or overactive chakras. Each class will consist of herbs based on its related chakra. We will focus on the body parts connected to the chakra, and the physical symptoms that can be of consequence for that chakra being imbalanced. Each participant will get a short course on the herbs chosen for the class, what they are and what they do. Based on the information received you will be able to pick your herb(s) of choosing and make your own essential herb kit! To find out more details, join a class! Also check out other [Workshops in Washington](https://allevents.in/washington/workshops?ref=ep_desc_also), [Health & Wellness Events in Washington](https://allevents.in/washington/health-wellness?ref=ep_desc_also). Tickets for Introduction to Herbal Teas can be booked here. |Ticket Information||Ticket Price| |Intro to Herbs||USD 15| Stay tuned with the most relevant events happening around you. Attend, Share & Influence! E.g. Jack is first name and Mandanka is last name.
